LanguageData.Ind_Aluminium.label: aluminium
LanguageData.Ind_Aluminium.description: Aluminium is a silvery white, soft, nonmagnetic, ductile metal, remarkable for the metal's low density and for its ability to resist corrosion due to the phenomenon of passivation.
LanguageData.Ind_Concrete.label: concrete
LanguageData.Ind_Copper.label: copper
LanguageData.Ind_Copper.description: soft but beautiful metal, mostly used for art.
LanguageData.Ind_HighGradeSteel.label: high-grade steel
LanguageData.Ind_HighGradeSteel.description: High-grade steel used for building more stronger structures, tools, and weapons.
